duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage electrical staff, quality control, project management, and review design and construction documents.
Assist with process and instrumentation diagrams (P&IDs), and instrumentation & control implementation.

Design and construction phases responsibilities including Power Distribution, Motor Control, PLC Control System, Control Panels, Lighting, Facility Conduit and Wiring Design, Schematic and Logic Development, Knowledge of the National Electric Code, Working knowledge of AutoCAD®, Facility Construction Document and Shop Drawing Review, Facility Testing and Startup.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 6 years experience in Industrial Electrical Design
Professional Engineer license in Maryland or ability to obtain
